item.description:
Join us for movie night. We bring you a movie and discussion group that can help heal your life. Best selling author Louise L. Hayes shares her message in the movie "You Can Heal Your Life" about mental causes for physical illnesses and the metaphysical ways to overcome them. You will leave this evening empowered and ready to make changes in your life.

We will also share information from the book, "Heal Your Body", The Mental Causes for Physical Illnesses and the Metaphysical Way to Overcome Them.

Do you have shoulder pain? Do you have leg pain? What is the metaphysical reason? Pain in your ankles? Well it may have this meaning, Inflexibility and guilt. Ankles represent the inability to receive pleasure.

Come find out more!
6:45- 8:00pm

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: You Can Heal Your Life,Louise Hayes Movie and Discussion
